metadata.description:
Arbiter Records brings you an excerpt from one of their latest traditional world music albums. Taishikichô Chôshi is a particular style of Japanese Gagaku music (traditional Japanese Imperial Court Music), recorded in 1941.

Other works on the album include mulitiple varieties of Gagaku music as well as traditional Buddhist sutras. The whole album can be purchased online at Qualiton Imports Ltd.
metadata.creator: Kokusai Bunka Shinkokai
metadata.title: Japanese Traditional Music
metadata.creator: Kokusai Bunka Shinkokai
